@/01-example.description: Demonstration of a selection of the nodes in the library. Run in debugger.

@/02-example.description: Log coordinates to a file on a SD card.

@/03-example.description: Calculate distance and course to a destination. Run in debugger. Enter coordinates (decimal degrees) of destination in the tweak-number nodes.

@/cardinal.description: Convert course (decimal degrees) to cardinal direction.

H1sh--Afc.description: On each update (UPD), wait this number of milliseconds for data to arrive from GPS device (default=1000).
H1sh--Afc.label: Wait

@/distance-between.description: Calculates distance in metres between two positions, both specified as signed decimal-degrees latitude and longitude. Uses great-circle distance computation for hypothetical sphere of radius 6372795 meters. Because Earth is no exact sphere, rounding errors may be up to 0.5%.

rkQpdoBAM9.description: Pulse on successful read. Will only pulse if altitude valid.
rkQpdoBAM9.label: Done

@/course-to.description: Calculates course in degrees (North=0, West=270) from position 1 to position 2, both specified as signed decimal-degrees latitude and longitude. Because Earth is no exact sphere, calculated course may be off by a tiny fraction.

attachments.content:
Lat1	Long1	Lat2	Long2	Deg
52.00001	0	52.00002	0	0

SJ7z-RPkmq.description: Pulse on successful read. Will only pulse if altitude valid.
SJ7z-RPkmq.label: Done

ryVmxFzAfq.description: Pulse on successful read. Will only pulse if date valid.
ryVmxFzAfq.label: Done

BkqWrSAM9.description: Pulse on successful read. Will only pulse if datetime valid.
BkqWrSAM9.label: Done

HyXgd6v1Xq.description: Pulse on successful read. Will only pulse if altitude valid.
HyXgd6v1Xq.label: Done

SJMqs8dJQq.description: The total number of characters received from the GPS.
SJMqs8dJQq.label: nChar

H13rTt1Qq.description: The number of $GPRMC or $GPGGA sentences that had a fix.
H13rTt1Qq.label: nSent

ByWUTtJQ9.description: Failed checksum. The number of sentences of all types that failed the checksum test.
ByWUTtJQ9.label: failChk

ryzU6FJQc.description: Passed checksum. The number of sentences of all types that passed the checksum test.
ryzU6FJQc.label: passChk

@/get-diagnostics.description: Retrieve data that can help diagnose problems with streaming data from the GPS.

SkXNTI9kXc.description: Pulse on successful read. Will only pulse if HDOP valid.
SkXNTI9kXc.label: Done

@/get-precision.description:
Read horizontal dilution of precision (HDOP). HDOP provides a
measure of accuracy in 2-D position (i.e. Latitude and Longitude).

HyVVldHCGc.description: Pulse on successful read. Will only pulse if location valid.
HyVVldHCGc.label: Done

@/get-satellite-count.description: Get number of satellites currently being used.

S1QSeg9JQc.description: Pulse on successful read. Will only pulse if speed valid.
S1QSeg9JQc.label: Done

@/get-speed-kmph.description: Read speed in kilometres per hour.

ryQA8z5175.description: Pulse on successful read. Will only pulse if speed valid.
ryQA8z5175.label: Done

@/get-speed-mps.description: Read speed in metres per second.

Bk7x7Gc179.description: Pulse on successful read. Will only pulse if speed valid.
Bk7x7Gc179.label: Done

@/get-speed-mph.description: Read speed in miles per hour.

ryzSMGHRzc.description: Pulse on successful read. Will only pulse if time valid.
ryzSMGHRzc.label: Done

S1QTJtDJX5.description: Pulse on successful read. Will only pulse if altitude valid.
S1QTJtDJX5.label: Done

H1SeAWRG5.description: Pulse on successful read. Will only pulse if location valid.
H1SeAWRG5.label: Done

rJQ9ibqJQ5.description: Pulse on successful read. Will only pulse if speed valid.
rJQ9ibqJQ5.label: Done

description: Arduino NMEA (National Marine Electronics Association) parsing library (wraps https://github.com/mikalhart/TinyGPSPlus). Provides nodes for extracting position, date, time, altitude, speed, and course from consumer GPS devices. Tested using  a NEO-6M.
name: gps
